modules.name: Filesystem
modules.description: Module used to create, read and delete files and folders from disk. It can also be used to verify if certain files and folders exist, or even renaming them or checking permissions

modules.name: SQL
modules.description: SQL module to use with SQLite and MySQL

modules.name: Http client
modules.description: HTTP client to make http requests

modules.name: IRC
modules.description: IRC module used to create IRC bots to interact with the server

modules.name: Websockets
modules.description: Websockets module used to create websocket servers or clients. Can be used to communicate with the browser or other websocket servers

modules.name: Discord
modules.description: Discord module used to interact with discord bots
